PageTitle: display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer interface verbose
FuncDef: The display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer interface verbose command displays detailed BGP IPv6 unnumbered peer information. The display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer interface verbose command displays detailed BGP IPv6 unnumbered peer information. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer interface { <interface-name> | <IfType> <IFNum> } verbose

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies an interface number.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display bgp ipv6 unnumbered peer interface 100GE 1/0/8 verbose
